{{unreferenced|date=December 2010}} {{Mergefrom|Sixt India|date=May 2009}} [[Image:Sixtrentacar logo.png|right|thumb|Sixt logo]] :''For the town in France, see [[Sixt-Fer-Ã -Cheval]].'' '''Sixt''' is a European [[car rental]] company. It has around 3,500 service stations in over 80 countries. Sixt was founded in 1912 by Martin Sixt in Munich.
==Company facts== [[Image:Filiale der Sixt AG am T2 in MUC.JPG|thumb|Sixt counter in [[Munich]], Germany]] *Revenue (2006): â¬1.44 billion *[[Earnings before interest and taxes|EBIT]]: â¬153.3 million *[[Earnings before taxes|EBT]]: â¬121.647 million *Employees: 2,015 *[[CEO]]: Mr Erich Sixt *[[CFO]]: Dr. Julian zu Putlitz *[[Chief operating officer|COO]]: Mr Detlef Paetsch *Company Headquarters: [[Pullach]], Germany
==See also== [[Sixt India]]
